Package io.github.nikmang.shserver.game

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
io.github.nikmang.shserver.game.GameController
public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
Class responsible for controlling the game. This maintains individual gameflow (game state, game board, cards, leader roles).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    GameController​(int playerCount)
    Create a game controller instance with specified player count for game board onfiguration.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController​(int playerCount)
      Create a game controller instance with specified player count for game board onfiguration.
      Parameters:
      playerCount - Amount of players in the game.

  • Method Details

    • getCardsInPlay

      public java.util.List<Card> getCardsInPlay()
      Gets the cards that are currently in play. If no cards currently in play then returns 3 new cards from the deck.
      Returns:
      unmodifiable list of current cards in play.

    • removeCardFromPlay

      public boolean removeCardFromPlay​(int index)
      Remove the card at specified index from the game, into the discarded pile. Updates the game state to GameState.CARD_CHOICE.
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the card bust be within the list of provided cards (e.g 3 cards means can only choose 0,1,2).
      Returns:
      true if index corresponded to a card and could be removed.

    • playCard

      public GameBoardEffect playCard​(int index)
      Play a card and update active effect. If successful, sets the game state to GameState.SPECIAL.
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the card that is found in getCardsInPlay().
      Returns:
      The GameBoardEffect for given play.

    • inspectUserPartyCard

      public Party inspectUserPartyCard​(User user)
      Gets the political party of a given user. Search for name using ClientController.getUserByName(String). Transitions game state to GameState.VOTING.
      Parameters:
      user - the target user for the action.
      Returns:
      Party of target user. If no user found then Party.NONE is returned.

    • setPresident

      public boolean setPresident​(User user)
      Sets the president for the turn.
      Parameters:
      user - User to be set as president.
      Returns:
      true if president was set (they were not currently chancellor or president).

    • setChancellor

      public boolean setChancellor​(User user)
      Sets the chancellor for the turn.
      Parameters:
      user - User to be set as chancellor.
      Returns:
      true if chancellor was set (they were not currently chancellor or president).

    • getGameState

      public GameState getGameState()

    • getPresident

      public User getPresident()

    • getChancellor

      public User getChancellor()
